fields.name: Cpu
fields.description: Cpu quantity allocated to each Application Live View component instance. 1 core can be represented by 1 or 1000m.

fields.name: InstanceCount
fields.description: Desired instance count of Application Live View component instance.

fields.name: Memory
fields.description: Memory quantity allocated to each Application Live View component instance. 1 GB can be represented by 1Gi or 1024Mi.
